tool_description: Processes billing transactions, payment methods, and financial operations for user accounts.

transaction_type.description: Type of transaction: charge, refund, credit, adjustment

payment_method_id.description: Payment method to use for the transaction

description.description: Description or reason for the transaction

retry_failed.description: Whether to retry failed payment attempts

send_receipt.description: Whether to send email receipt to customer

error_messages: Invalid transaction type: Use one of [charge, refund, credit, adjustment].
Payment method declined: The payment method was declined by the processor.
Insufficient funds: The payment source has insufficient funds.
Invalid amount: Amount must be greater than 0 and within processing limits.
Currency not supported: Use a supported currency code.
Payment method not found: The specified payment_method_id does not exist.
usage: Provide account_id, transaction_type, and amount to process billing transactions. Optionally specify payment_method_id, currency, description, and receipt preferences.

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for the processed transaction
